mapper.update: UPDATE review_reply SET content = #{content}, modi_date = SYSDATE() WHERE rr_no = #{rrNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_reply(r_no, s_id, id, content, status) VALUES(#{rNo}, #{sId}, #{id}, #{content}, #{status})

INSERT INTO review(id, s_id, m_id, content, rating, r_picture, liked, status, reg_date, modi_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{sId}, #{mId}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{rPicture}, #{liked}, #{status}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET heart = heart + 1 WHERE s_id = #{sId}
mapper.select: SELECT heart FROM shop WHERE s_id = #{sId}

SELECT review.r_no, review.id, review.s_id, review.m_id, review.content, review.rating, review.r_picture, review.liked, review.reg_date, review.modi_date, review.status, menu.name AS menuName FROM review JOIN menu ON review.m_id = menu.m_id WHERE review.s_id = #{sId} ORDER BY review.r_no DESC
SELECT * FROM menu WHERE s_id = #{sId} ORDER BY m_id ASC
SELECT * FROM menu_Option WHERE m_id = #{mId} ORDER BY price
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM menu WHERE s_id = #{s_id} ORDER BY category

SELECT * FROM shop where 1=1
AND category = #{category}
AND name like concat('%', #{keyword} ,'%')
ORDER BY s_id DESC
